cause.description:
Hey guys,
It's pretty cool that we have made it to the TOP 10 and have been there for almost an entire month.
Please help us VOTE (and KEEP US THERE)... please help us VOTE numerous time if you can!!!!
We are hours away from being semi-finalist... so log-on and VOTE for our films.
Thanks to ALL that VOTED and will VOTE!!!!
Name of Festival: Our Stage.com
Name of Film: Master Qi: On Training and Concentration
Category: Wacky & Weird
Link to Vote: http://www.ourstage.com/video/channel/31-wacky/ERPUVKYKBYCN-master-qi-on-training-and
1. It would be fun to win.
2. Winning is fun.
3. Why not?
cause.name: Please VOTE 4 John Woo4Girls and MASTER QI!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
